evolutionmod:TorisGift.NAME: Tori's gift
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a random #yGene.

evolutionmod:Tori.NAME: Tori
evolutionmod:Tori.FLAVOR: She's found her way back to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 additional Orb slot and random genes in all Orb slots.

evolutionmod:NimbleBoots.NAME: Nimble Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b5 or more cards in a turn, draw an additional card at the start of your next turn.

evolutionmod:PowerFocus.NAME: Power Focus
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Gene you Evoke each turn is evoked twice.

evolutionmod:MagicFocus.NAME: Magic Focus
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Skill you play each combat is played twice.

evolutionmod:StrengthFocus.NAME: Strength Focus
evolutionmod:StrengthFocus.FLAVOR: I'm not sure if it still works.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.

evolutionmod:Whip.NAME: Whip
evolutionmod:Whip.FLAVOR: I can use this as a weapon?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take

evolutionmod:OldOutfit.NAME: Old Outfit
evolutionmod:OldOutfit.FLAVOR: My favourite outfit, when I was human.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first Gene you Channel each turn is removed.

evolutionmod:ScoutMedal.NAME: Scout Medal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the combat Fate #b1 card of each type.
